overview:
nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:) Functionnw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+func nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(
    _ parameters: nw_parameters_t,
    _ allow_ultra_constrained: Bool
) Parameters parametersThe parameters to modify.

Whether or not ultra-constrained interfaces are allowed.

Explicitly allow connectivity over ultra-constrained interfaces. Without this being set, connections are not allowed to use these interfaces.

# nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Network ](/documentation/network)

- [ nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:) ](/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:))

-  nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:) 

Function# nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
func nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(
    _ parameters: nw_parameters_t,
    _ allow_ultra_constrained: Bool
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:)#parameters)

`parameters`The parameters to modify.

`allow_ultra_constrained`Whether or not ultra-constrained interfaces are allowed.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_set_allow_ultra_constrained(_:_:)#discussion)

Explicitly allow connectivity over ultra-constrained interfaces. Without this being set, connections are not allowed to use these interfaces.
